metadata.title: CVE-2021-38425 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
eProsima Fast DDS versions prior to 2.4.0 (#2269) are susceptible toexploitation when an attacker sends a specially crafted packet to flood atarget device with unwanted traffic, which may result in adenial-of-service condition and information exposure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38425` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fastdds-tools - 2.9.1+ds-1
libfastrtps2.9 - 2.9.1+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fastdds package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.1+ds-1').
